body_html:
you can get example code here, this is how I made it work (and figured out what the problem was) https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/learn/python/learn/estimators/rnn_test.py

The main thing to notice is that you MUST have an input_op_fn even though it is a python optional (the default operation currently does not work).

#4608

body:
you can get example code here, this is how I made it work (and figured out what the problem was) https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/learn/python/learn/estimators/rnn_test.py

The main thing to notice is that you MUST have an input_op_fn even though it is a python optional (the default operation currently does not work).

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/4608
